args.natural_language_statement: Let V be a finite-dimensional real vector space and T : V →ₗ[ℝ] V a linear map with no eigenvalues (i.e. for all λ : ℝ there is no nonzero v with T v = λ v). Prove that every T-invariant subspace W (i.e. Submodule.map T W ≤ W) has even dimension. Formalize this in Lean 4 / mathlib style and end the statement with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

/-!
# Axler Exercise 5.24

Suppose V is a finite-dimensional real vector space and T : V →ₗ[ℝ] V has no real eigenvalues.
Show that every subspace W ≤ V which is invariant under T has even dimension.
-/

open LinearMap Submodule

theorem Axler_exercise_5_24 {V : Type _} [AddCommGroup V] [Module ℝ V] [FiniteDimensional ℝ V]
  (T : V →ₗ[ℝ] V)
  (h_no_eig : ∀ λ : ℝ, (T - λ • LinearMap.id).ker = ⊥) :
  ∀ W : Submodule ℝ V, Submodule.map T W ≤ W → ∃ k : ℕ, finrank ℝ W = 2 * k := by sorry
